wikipedia_page.main: Nicholas Edward Brown (11 July 1849 in Redhill, Surrey – 25 November 1934 in Kew Gardens, London) was an English plant taxonomist and authority on succulents. He was also an authority on several families of plants, including Asclepiadaceae, Aizoaceae, Labiatae and Cape plants.

response: * N. E. Brown (Nicholas Edward Brown, 1849–1934), Kew Gardens plant taxonomist
